input_args.passage: 'Tales from the Crypt - Full Cast & Crew | Stars who appeared included Terri Hatcher, Demi Moore, Martin Sheen, Treat Williams, Margo Kidder and Joe Pesci. The series premiered on HBO, and edited reruns ...'
input_args.claim: 'These include Terri Hatcher, Demi Moore, Martin Sheen, Treat Williams, Margo Kidder, Joe Pesci, John Kassir, Roy Brocksmith, Miguel Ferrer, Cam Clarke, Larry Drake, Bobcat Goldthwait, Lance Henriksen, and Sherrie Rose.'
